name: Help Yourself (Aquarii)
description:
A puzzle game using time travel, what you do in the past affects the future,

controls:

-WASD - move

-Spacebar-interact

Generator mechanics:

-use the generators to enable the switches and to toggle on and off powered doors

-Generators have finite battery

-Generators will not deplete in battery life if turned off

-if a generator is turned off, the objects it's affecting will remain in their current state
